title: 1 Month Free! Cozy NE 1x1. Great City Views, Space Needle.
posting_body: Want more info on this unit?
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 808 Sq.
From sleek interior finishes to phenomenal amenities and architectural surprises throughout, Walton Lofts is a thoughtful, purposeful place to call home.
Choose from a variety of studio, one- and two-bedroom loft-style floor plans with floor-to-ceiling views of the Seattle skyline and Puget Sound.
Work from home in peaceful luxury in the Grand Library or even from the rooftop deck, when the weather is just right.
Walton’s coveted location on the Belltown waterfront is just steps from the Space Needle, Pike Place Market, numerous parks and some of the city’s best dining and shopping options.
- Stunning Seattle skyline and Puget Sound views
- Outdoor rooftop lounge with fire pit, BBQs, dining area and panoramic Sound and city views
- Private guest suite for your guests when they visit
- Designed to Green Globes green building standards
We are located at the intersection of Vine St and Western Ave in Belltown.
Walton Lofts welcomes your furry family members.
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.

Close proximity to Downtown Seattle Belltown Seattle Center Pike Place Market Seattle Art Museum Olympic Sculpture Park waterfront Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation Amazon REI Elliott Bay Great Wheel Myrtle Edwards Park Zulily Pier 69 Westlake Center Seattle Aquarium Holland America Port of Seattle
